title: Zika Microcephaly Outbreak Caused by Monsanto Pesticide?
subtitle: An unsubstantiated theory suggesting a Monsanto pesticide caused an uptick in microcephaly births in Brazil reached a tipping point when it was promoted by George Takei.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Doctors believe an increased number of microcephaly cases in Brazil is due to the use of a Monsanto-manufactured pesticide.
